name: Adventure In The Ruins
description:
There is a treasure deep in the ruins, find it as quickly as possible and dont forget to collect coins. 

How to play:

Move - A and D

Jump - Space

Left Mouse Button- Shoot 

Сlick and hold Right Mouse Button - Hang on the hook

Have fun

For any questions or suggestions send email with subject "AdventureInTheRuins" to: veronikamart1994@gmail.com

All assets are used from the site: https://craftpix.net/
